summary: An Ordinance granting a permit to Rainier Development Company, its successors and assigns, to construct and maintain a tunnel under the surface of Bell Street from the water front to the east line of Second Avenue in the City of Seattle, and to construct and maintain in said tunnel and upon the surface of said street sluice boxes, water pipes and conduits for the purpose of grading the streets and private property in the local improvement district created by Ordinance No. 14993 of the City of Seattle.
